Class CharacterCardController

java.lang.Object
It.polimi.ingsw.Controller.CharacterCardController
public class CharacterCardController extends Object
The controller class for the Character Card.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    PlayCard1(Card1Message message)
    It is used to play Character Card with id 1 which allows you to move students from card to an island.
    void
    PlayCard10(Card10Message message)
    It is used to play Character Card with id 10 which allows you move a student to the dining room.
    void
    PlayCard12(Card12Message message)
    It is used to play Character Card with id 12 which allows you to remove 3 students of this color from the dining room of each student.
    void
    PlayCard3(Card3and5Message message)
    It is used to play Character Card with id 3 which allows you to count the influence as if mother nature had finished her movement there.
    void
    PlayCard4()
    It is used to play Character Card with id 4 which allows you to increase the number of steps that mother nature can perform of 2.
    void
    PlayCard5(Card3and5Message message)
    It is used to play Character Card with id 5 which allows you to place a prohibition cards on an island chosen by you.
    void
    PlayCard6()
    It is used to play Character Card with id 6 which allows you to calculate the influence on an island or a group of islands without counting the towers.
    void
    PlayCard9()
    It is used to play Character Card with id 9 which allows you to have 2 bonus points in the calculation of the influence.

  • Method Details

    • PlayCard1

      public void PlayCard1(Card1Message message) throws InvalidInputException, NoActivePlayerException
      It is used to play Character Card with id 1 which allows you to move students from card to an island.
      Parameters:
      message - : contains the index of a student and the index of an island.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException
      NoActivePlayerException

    • PlayCard3

      public void PlayCard3(Card3and5Message message) throws InvalidInputException, NoActivePlayerException
      It is used to play Character Card with id 3 which allows you to count the influence as if mother nature had finished her movement there.
      Parameters:
      message - : contains the index of an island.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException
      NoActivePlayerException

    • PlayCard4

      public void PlayCard4() throws InvalidInputException, NoActivePlayerException
      It is used to play Character Card with id 4 which allows you to increase the number of steps that mother nature can perform of 2.

      InvalidInputException
      NoActivePlayerException

    • PlayCard5

      public void PlayCard5(Card3and5Message message) throws InvalidInputException, NoEntryTilesException, NoActivePlayerException

    • PlayCard12

      public void PlayCard12(Card12Message message) throws InvalidInputException, NoActivePlayerException
      It is used to play Character Card with id 12 which allows you to remove 3 students of this color from the dining room of each student.
